com.heaven7.java.reflectyio

接口 ReflectyWriter


  • public interface ReflectyWriter
    reflecty writer

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void begin(java.lang.Object obj)
      called this writer begin the write
      void beginArray()
      mark the writer begin to write an array. can called from array/list
      void beginObject(com.heaven7.java.reflecty.ReflectyContext context, java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
      mark to write an object. can be called from object and map.
      void end(java.lang.Object obj)
      called this writer end the write
      void endArray()
      mark the writer write the last array end. can called from array/list
      void endObject()
      mark to write object end.
      void flush()
      flush the content to the writer
      void name(java.lang.String s)
      write the string as name
      void nullValue()
      write a null value
      void value(java.lang.Boolean obj)
      write a boolean value
      void value(java.lang.Character obj)
      write a Character value
      void value(java.lang.Number obj)
      write a number as value
      void value(java.lang.String obj)
      write a string value

    • 方法详细资料

      • begin

        void begin(java.lang.Object obj)
    throws java.io.IOException
        called this writer begin the write
        参数:
        obj - begin to write target object
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs
        从以下版本开始:
        1.0.4

      • end

        void end(java.lang.Object obj)
  throws java.io.IOException
        called this writer end the write
        参数:
        obj - end to write target object
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs
        从以下版本开始:
        1.0.4

        s - the name

      • beginObject

        void beginObject(com.heaven7.java.reflecty.ReflectyContext context,
                 java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
          throws java.io.IOException
        mark to write an object. can be called from object and map.
        参数:
        context - the context
        clazz - the class
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
